duties_responsibilities.duty: Support and execute digital marketing initiatives across social media, web, and email channels.
Utilize CMS for web content creation and modification, as well as email templates for email content creation and modification.
Support the execution of social media posts, social listening, and data mining.
Collaborate with teams within the Marketing department to fulfill digital marketing duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Advertising, Communications, or Journalism
